# The order of packages is significant, because pip processes them in the order
# of appearance. Changing the order has an impact on the overall integration
# process, which may cause wedges in the gate later.
pbr>=1.8 # Apache-2.0
cmd2>=0.6.7 # MIT
PrettyTable<0.8,>=0.7.1 # BSD
pyparsing>=2.1.0 # MIT
six>=1.9.0 # MIT
stevedore>=1.17.1 # Apache-2.0
unicodecsv>=0.8.0;python_version<'3.0' # BSD
PyYAML>=3.10.0 # MIT
# Blacklist setuptools 34.0.0-34.3.0 due to https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/issues/951
setuptools!=24.0.0,!=34.0.0,!=34.0.1,!=34.0.2,!=34.0.3,!=34.1.0,!=34.1.1,!=34.2.0,!=34.3.0,!=34.3.1,!=34.3.2,!=36.2.0,>=16.0 # PSF/ZPL
